The 1968 Rockets, the first Rockets team to exist, started their season 2-13. Their 2 wins came against the same team- the Seattle Supersonics

If the Rockets win tonight, they'll also be 2-13, and their 2 wins will have come against the same team- the Oklahoma City Thunder.
